message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $120. I think it will be very beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to counter with $100 for the product. I believe this is a fair price given its value.
